comments.html: Spot on! Spotify's integration of podcasts into their music player app lacks the thoughtful design that dedicated podcast player apps like Overcast and Castro offer. Podcast listening deserves its own dedicated platform, separate from music, to enhance the user experience. As a longtime Spotify user, I find it frustrating when my podcast enjoyment is compromised by the cluttered interface of their combined app. Here's hoping for a separate Spotify Podcasts app to streamline the listening experience.
